PHRASE.LANG: This chihuahua is the smallest of the bunch, but he's also the most loyal. Just don't mention his past work with fast food. This item is a companion pet. [#Legal]
Le Chihuahua est le plus petit du lot, mais aussi le plus loyal. Évitez juste de mentionner son passé d'acteur. Cet élément est un animal de compagnie. [#Legal]
Dieser Chihuahua ist der kleinste von allen, aber auch der treuste. Sprich ihn nur nicht auf seine Fast-Food-Vergangenheit an. Dieses Objekt ist ein Begleitertier. [#Legal]
Il chihuahua è il più piccolo del gruppo, ma anche il più fedele. Ma non ricordargli mai di aver lavorato in un fast food. Cucciolo da compagnia. [#Legal]
Este chihuahua es la mascota más pequeña, pero también es la más leal. Te recomendamos que no le recuerdes su pasado en el mundo de la farándula. Este objeto es una mascota. [#Legal]
이 치와와는 가장 작은 강아지에 속하지만, 주인을 가장 사랑하는 강아지이기도 합니다. 이 아이템은 애완동물입니다. [#Legal]
This chihuahua is the smallest of the bunch, but he's also the most loyal. Just don't mention his past work with fast food. This item is a companion pet. [#Legal]
這芝娃娃是同伴中最小，但也是最忠心的一隻。但不要餵牠吃快餐。這款道具是隨身夥伴。 [#Legal]
這芝娃娃是同伴中最小，但也是最忠心的一隻。但不要餵牠吃快餐。這款道具是隨身夥伴。 [#Legal]
This chihuahua is the smallest of the bunch, but he's also the most loyal. Just don't mention his past work with fast food. This item is a companion pet. [#Legal]
